alert.note: Alert for Rock Island (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 7:41PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Rock Island, Cedar, northwestern Scott, eastern Johnson, southwestern Jones, Muscatine, southeastern Linn and southwestern Clinton Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 741 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near West Liberty to near Fairport. Movement was north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... West Branch around 750 PM CDT. Durant, Wilton and Rochester around 755 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Tipton, Bennett, Mechanicsville, Stanwood, Lowden, Wheatland and Calamus. This includes Interstate 80 in Iowa between mile markers 246 and 285. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
